hovertext: Ed Vaizey
Income Categories
Employment
Payment of £250 expected for writing an article on 3 October 2016. Hours: 1.5 hrs. This fee will be donated to charity.
Payment of £250 expected for writing an article on 25 October 2016. Hours: 1.5 hrs. This fee will be donated to charity.
Payment of £250 expected for writing an article on 9 January 2017. Hours 1.5 hrs. This fee will be donated to charity.
Payment of £250 expected for writing an article on 13 January 2017. Hours 1.5 hrs. This fee will be donated to charity.

Payment of £805 for attending and speaking at a conference on Referendums and Democratic Politics in New York City on 3 and 4 November 2016. Hours: 4 hrs. The Center for European and Mediterranean Studies also paid for my flights and accommodation.
20 March 2017, payment of £400 for attending and speaking at a discussion on global political trends in London on 19 March 2017. Hours: 3 hrs.

From 20 December 2016 until further notice, consultant to Lion
Tree LLC, 660 Madison Avenue, New York, NY 10065. For providing general analysis of European telecom, media and technology sector developments, and hosting seminars and events. From 3 May 2017, I will be paid a monthly retainer of £6,459.95 plus related expenses. Hours: approx. 32 hrs per month. I consulted A
Co
BA about this appointment. (Registered 13 January 2017; updated 19 June 2017)

From 1 January 2017 until 30 April 2017, Chairman, International e
Games Committee, c/o International Group Management Limited, Stoke Park Park Road, Stoke Poges, Bucks SL2 4
PG, a board established to promote international competition in e-sports. I will receive a monthly fee of £2,083 for this role, plus related expenses. Hours: approx. 8 hrs per month. I consulted A
Co
BA about this appointment. (Registered 03 February 2017; updated 21 June 2017)
Payment of £200 expected for an article written on 29 January 2017 and published the following day. Hours: approx. 1.5 hrs.
Payment of £200 expected for an article written on 15 March 2017. Hours: approx. 1.5 hrs.

31 March 2017, received £1,500 for speech to Navisite Europe Ltd, Thameside House, Hurst Road, East Molesey KT8 9
AY. Hours: 6 hrs. (Registered 04 April 2017)

From 1 May 2017 until further notice, consultant to International Group Management Limited, Stoke Park Park Road, Stoke Poges, Bucks SL2 4
PG, on esports and leisure. I will receive a monthly fee of £2,083 for this role, plus related expenses. Hours: approx. 8 hrs per month. I consulted A
Co
BA about this appointment. (Registered 21 June 2017)
